content.detailedDescription:
july 9th 2005.
   i "dreampt" that i was in a dark room with very little lighting. everything was smooth. i couldnt "see" anyone but i kept hearing this voice "talking" to me. in front of me was a giant monitor. i was told to look at the screen and then heard these words in my ear..."these two worlds are life giving worlds like your own." the monitor then became this giant 3dimensional  planet. i "orbited this planet and was able to see what it looked like, what features it had, (mountains, lakes, etc). after on full orbit i was "taken" to the "other" planet and the same thing happened. i asked where i was in relation to these two different stars and was told "i was in the pegasus star system." that was all i remember about the dream.
   now before you guys think im wasting your time,i was at work a few days later and remembering this dream drew on paper the star map that i saw showing me these two planets. that was as far as it went until about a week later. i was watching a show about mars on nova (t.V.) about a week or so later and it reminded me of this "dream." i went online to research pegasus star system (until then i knew absolutely nothing about it). the very first web site i went to up popped a map of the great sqaure of pegasus"...Which exactly matched the map i drew from my dream just a few days earlier. my parent can vouch for all of this. i assure you i look for no publicity, no fame, no nothing...Except for someone to hear what i am saying and possibly give me some explaination of what any of this means. i dont want to waste anyone's time over this so if its no big deal fine...But if i could something to understand this...I dont know. thanks in advance. tom duchene macomb mi.
content.summary: I need to contact someone over this and not sure who or what else to do.

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing an object at 9:30 p.M. last night that i would describe being similar to a very bright star for almost three months on a regular basis nightly. i went out to look at the night sky and looked up at the stars when i saw a very bright object to my south south east direction from my home. it really stood out from the stars because of the intense brightness. i watched the object slowly move in unpredictable patterns. it was hard to judge the distance and altitude being at night. i went back into the house to get my bincoulars. when i looked through them i could just make out a red colored ring pulsating and moving in a circular motion. when i pulled the binoculars down and looked at it with my eyes; it suddenly dimmed itself slowly and disappeared. i went back into my house wondering what in the world i just witnessed. i went back out maybe 45 mins. later and observed it back in it's original spot i had seen it earlier. it made no sound at all and definately wasn't an airplane, helicopter, weather ballon, or any swamp gas! i have served 23 yrs. in army national guard so far and have never seen any equipment with this technology to do the things this object did in the sky. i thought about calling the local authorities here and seeing if any other reports possibly came in from any area residents; but changed my mind.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright starlike ufo

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving north on the saw mill parkway about 11:45 pm to 12:00 am. i noticed a triangular shaped craft in the sky over the town of mount kisco in westchester new york. at first i thought it was a plane from near by westchester airport, but i noticed the craft was stationary and not moving and i was driving more north on the park way i got a better look at the object and then i could see no form of wings or blinking lights to justify the object as an airplane. as i got off the parkway and onto route 117 north, i lost view of the object and did not see it again.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, 3 lights like belgum ufo of the late 80s

content.detailedDescription: At 10:55 pm out side laying down looking at stars when i saw a bright moving star that got bigger and bigger about the size of venus then it moved slowly which would have acually been very fast since it was so high up when i saw it as it left our atmospher.....This is a regular orb spher ufo that anyone can see over plano texas this tme of year it just takes an hour looking each night and you will see them...As others i tell about this have seen them also.This is my last report i will fill out as i could do this every week and i have skipped the last several sightings i have seen.
content.summary: A moving star that got as bright as venus,big diamond  shape then left !

content.detailedDescription: I noticed this at 1:07 am in the west sky and first thought it was a planet or star untill i could make out the blinking lights. it has not moved and is still in the sky as i write this, it is now 1:13 am.
content.summary: Red, white and green lights that blink and change directions

content.detailedDescription: While driving i observed an unknown object...    i had just made an exit from 202e on priest drive.  i turned right on priest drive heading south bound.  while i was driving in the left lane at the posted speed limit, with my window down, i saw a very bright white star-like sphere on my left (east) at approximately 1,000 feet above ground level. the object itself was moving in a direction from southeast to the northwest very slowly. the light was constant and there was no strobe visible. the light did not appear to be landing lamps, and there was no visible red navigation light that should have been visible on an aircraft flying in the direction of the object. the object was also flying in an area i would consider dangerous. my reason for this statement is because sky harbor traffic was departing the runways to the east at this time. i believe it was not transitioning class bravo airspace because it was flying too low. ..... now to continue my sighting. while continuing to view the object, several trees came between me and the object. when this happened, the object was taken out of my view for approximately 2 seconds.  right after the trees had passed, the object was gone.  i slowed the vehicle and continued to look constantly for the next several minutes; ever after i turned left on university to head east toward rural.  this was the first time i have ever observed an object like this. flying and aviation is something that is second nature to me.  i am a licensed private pilot, and i was a helicopter crew chief in the marine corps. i do not believe that what i observed was phenomenon that was associated with, or can be deduced to weather or optical physics. i had a smile on my face for the next 10 minutes.
content.summary: Very bright white star-like object moving slowly - 2 miles east of sky harbor runway 25r 1,000 feet a.G.L.

content.detailedDescription: I hesitated to write but i know what my daughter and i saw the day after the fourth of july. my very mature 11 year old and i went outside on the 5th to see the area fireworks going off again .We noticed a really bright star to the north and we were admiring it for a few minutes when it suddenly began to move. my daughter and i quickly looked at each other to question its movement. it came completely over top of us as slow as could be and made absolutely no sound. we started asking each other if we saw airplane lights on anything resembling a plane...It was nothing like a plane with no blinking lights or sound. we noticed 4 red lights(kinda in a square formation)underneath. after it passed over our house, it took off to the east very quickly and it was low enough to see a red-like fire glow in the back center.  it vanished. not even 5 seconds later,it re-appeared in the north instantly...We were both in shock and wondering how the heck did it just take off to the east and re-appear in the north even closer to us again. it stayed in place maybe 30 seconds and then took off once again to the north never to be seen again. i ran in to get the video camera hoping it would come back but was quite disappointed. what i did notice when planes flew over that clear night,it was easy to see the planes(no matter how high in the sky) and heard the sounds as well. what my daughter and i saw that evening was something that "hyper-spaced" away and was very distinctive. i'm prepared with a camera outside now all the time hoping to get in on vid.
content.summary: Bright star-like object moving slowly and then taking off and reappearing

content.detailedDescription:
On 21 july 2008 before going to bed i went out back of my house to have a smoke and i sat in the rocking chair on my back patio to smoke. the chair was facing out to the left of my house and i noticed a bright flashing light moving at a medium speed in a strait line. the night was realy clear and you can see all the stars, at first i was sure it was just a plane but there was nothing else going on so i continued to watch it. and to my suprize as it was going in a strait line it then stoped and started moving back and forth along the same line while strobing bright bright white then it stalled out stopped strobing and changed color into bright red. then it just vannashed, i was so shocked at what i saw i knocked on my bedroom window from the out side and called my wife outside to explain what i saw. i was pointing up in the sky explaining it to her and then it apeared again but this time was green/blue. it moved back and forth and then up and down and even diaganal. it continued changing color and dissapearing and reapearing for about 40 min then it just vanished. my wife just told me to calm down and not to get all worked up. she convinced me to let it go and to come back inside. but it consumed me the following day and when i went outside the next night at the same time it apeared agian on the 23rd of july but this time for not as long. 

i have served 7 years in the military and i have been living here in killeen for the last 4 years right outside the post and i have seen many types of military aircraft such as black hawk helicopters, shanooks and even jets flying low and fast but never have i ever seen anything like this, not even in iraq. i must add that i do have a video camera and i did go get it to try to film but the batery was dead so i tried to use my cell camera and it didnt come out good and you cant make anything out. i talked to people the next day about it but no one that i know was up or outside at that time so they did not see it. i felt copelled to share and it is my hope that someone out there saw the same thing or if not can explain what i did see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white light flashing and moving back and forth then stoping and changed color to solid red then blue/green then storbe white again dissapearing inbetween.

content.detailedDescription:
i don't know who i owe the honor to but, this is my second sighting in

 than a week. the ufo was half sphere and half straight up and down i.

 my dog and i sat on the porch like the last time and we sat their maybe

 a couple of minutes when i looked to the west to a power plant across

 the river from us.

 when i noticed a light come on from the object it first looked like and

 mumerical # 1 than it sat in the sky for about a minute and a half. it

 to me seemed it had a problem with it's propulsion sytem it went a 

 distance and slow again the lights on the front were flckering like 

 power. it came to across our house when the object veered about 35

 degrees and proceed slowly like it had a problem with front lights

 they kept fade out comeing on flickering and finally they must have 

 turned them off. my neighbor downstairs i awoke her to see the episode

 she remarked their is no sound. could not make out shape. distance of

 object i'll be guessing 5,000 feet and it was clear night we could see

 stars and other aircraft fying over us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Look up in sky to the west of me and there it was sitting in air.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my girlfriends house in longmont, taking highway 66 east to cr 13 south to firestone. going east on 66, it was late already, so the sky was dark. the only lights around were occasional streetlights and oncoming headlights. my windshield had smudges on it so the light reflecting off it was slightly different the the light coming through the clean parts of the glass, so i was getting used to it looking weird. as soon as it got to the darkest part of the highway, i kept seeing this sparkle-like light. out of the corner of my eye it was like blue red and white-is lights flashing for a split second then nothing. i tought it wasw a plane or something at first so i ignored it. then it kept happening at different spots in the sky. so i thought it was my eyes. i couldnt trust my windshield anymore so i pulled over on the side of the road and got out to get a better look see. sure enough, i wasnt hallucinating. it was almost like a firecracker as in almost like sparkling but different colors. at one point it stopped flashing and changed to a constant white light. faint at first, it got brighter and brighter for about 5 seconds then disappeared. it did that 2 or 3 times before changing back to the sparkles and flew off until i couldnt see it over houses anymore. i know what airplanes and helicopters look like at night. their lights have a constant pattern and the flight path is in a constant straight path or turning slowly and easily.  but this had random light flashes and a very zig zag-like, almost violent flight path with no real direction. i also know what planets and stars look like at night and this was a starless night with airplanes in the air to compare this thing to. the only other lights in the sky was the moon and a couple red and blue stationary bright lights around the object i saw. i eventually got home and couldnt see anything anymore. i told everyone immediately and got laughed at because i was alone. but i swear im not making this up. i even looked it up that night and even today( the following day) and nothing.
content.summary: Object with flashing lights and abnormal flight pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Well  i am not much for writing  but i live  up on a hill with a view of the western hemisphere and have 2 airports in my view  as well. 
i watch planes take off and andland ecery night for 9 years all night long,

this was just hovering in the western sky  for about 25  30 min  
the distance was at least 15 to 20 miles away
any movement was me not the object
it was the days after 9/11 and all air traffic was grounded
i just gonna let the footage speak for itself

i have more footage  just not enuff place to upload em
content.summary: Lights  just hovering in distance  on 9/12/01  the usa  was in a lockdown

content.detailedDescription:
I work at a hotel which overlooks the mississippi river, in downtown quincy, il, 200 miles north of st. louis, mo., and was on duty the night this sighting occurred.
around 9:35pm cst, i went outside to take a break and smoke a cigarette. i was looking west towards the mississippi river. as i looked up at the night sky, i noticed the big dipper to my northwest. to the left, or directly west, i noticed a large bright star, and a smaller star (or so i thought) to the north.
as i watched the smaller star, i realized that it was drifting north of the bright star ever so slowly. it continued moving slowly and then turned east towards me. as it got closer and within my view, i could see that it was elongated and displaying white lights on its corners, and red, white, and green pulsating lights on its bottom. 
it continued east and moved into the sky and out of my view. i then went to the front of the hotel, which is east, to see if i could see where it had gone; however, when i got to the front of the building, it had disappeared.
i then went back to the back of the building, where i was before, and sure enough, there it was right where i had first seen it; near the large bright star. as i quickly swept the sky with my eyes, i, unbelievable enough, saw two more star-like lights, for a total of three; and they too were displaying the same exact light patterns: red, white, and green; however, they maintained their positions to the left and to the right (southwest and northwest) of the first object. furthermore, they were much smaller in size relative to the first and their altitude was much lower in the sky; almost parallel to the treetops.
the original one i saw stayed near the large bright star and hovered there for a few seconds, and then it slowly danced around to the left and the right, while the other two hovered in place. then the first object slowly moved north and then east towards me, and then southwest in one full motion. (this was the best view that i had seen thus far. i would describe it as a very large, long, cigar shaped object, approximately several hundred meters in length, with white lights on each end and a glowing green and red center). of the other two, the one to the right continued north, and the one two the left continued south. all three departed in a sequenced, organized pattern of flight and melted into the black of night.
in conclusion, i don't know what they were, but they certainly did not exhibit conventional flight maneuvers. as a student pilot myself, i did not recognize any traditional movements. they could choose to hover, or turn 180 without incident. additionally, they made no sound whatsoever! 
to quote the great movie contact, "whatever it is...It ain't local"!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 cigar-shaped objects with red and green lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i had a fight with my wife annette, so i decided to go outside to get some fresh air.
2. i saw flashing lights above my house and then i noticed it was hovering above my house until it disappeared. 
3. i had no doubt it was a ufo. 
4. it was silent with red and orange flashing lights.
5. if i could i would have touched it but it was too far.
6. it disappeared instantly.
content.summary: V shaped object, red and orange flashing lights, and then it disappeared instantly

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home about 12:00 noon. i made a right hand turn (east) onto marilyn parkway from kitty hawk (north). i had just finished turning when i looked to the north over marilyn redd park and some apartments higher on a hill. i could not believe my eyes. it was a domed shaped object flat on the bottom. it did not move (wobble) or make a noise. it was hovering adjacent to the mesquite airport in the east direction. i pulled my car over to the side of the road and watched the thing for about two minutes. it then departed in the northerly direction and took between one and two minutes to completely disappear. i did not have my camera with me (although i do now carry a throwaway 35 mm in my car). later, i returned to the area and took a photo of the exact scene as i saw it. i have superimposed a ufo in the position that it was then located. this photo now represents exactly what i saw on that date (june 17 or 18, 2008). according to a local map, the craft was approximately 2460 feet from my location. from my perspective it was about the size of a quarter. it was the most incredible thing that i have ever seen. previous to this sighting i never really gave ufos much thought. i didn't necessarily believe in them or disbelieve them. i had no opinion but i certainly do now. most of the people that i have related this story to think that i'm crazy . . .Who knows, maybe i am but i know what i saw is what i saw. i  have been totally unable to find another person in this town of 20,000 people who also witnessed it.
content.summary: Light colored craft hovered for 2 minutes. made no noise.
content.locationName: Las Vegas or St. George, Nevada

content.detailedDescription:
There was a powerful storm cloud to the east with bright pink, peach and yellow flashings of lightning. i'd actually watched it from the store parking lot for a few minutes earlier. 

anyways, when i got out of my car to look at it (the storm clouds) when  this ball of light (like a passing star, solid but with an aura to it), flew directly overhead- from west to east. i thought it was a plane at first but it was one white round light and fairly low (maybe 250-500 feet) and it flew in a direct straight line into the storm clouds where it was concealed by the clouds. no beacons, no streaks or con trails, no sound... no deviation in flight path- some things you'd expect from a low flying aircraft. 

i was feeling good, watching the storm clouds (nature's beauty and such) but it felt, surreal after. at first i wondered if i had just seen the light ball, but then i thought if it were my imagination it would have been a lot more exciting :) i have never witnessed anything exactly like this before.

the storm clouds- maybe one or two forked lightning flashes after a couple minutes, but otherwise far calmer than before (though i don't think the light and storm activity were related).
content.summary: White ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
I���m rewriting a report i entered earlier today because the previous one didn���t have enough information and due to being rushed it was rather poorly written.  i also realized it was sunday the 6th rather then the 13th that the event took place.

on  sunday the 6th of july around 6pm i was driving  from a restaurant in westland towards my home in livonia (michigan).   i turned off of wayne rd onto ann arbor trail (heading towards farmington rd) when off to my left i noticed what at first i thought might be a plane.  i quickly realized that i couldn���t see any wings or a tail so i started viewing it more intently.  it was close enough that i should have been able to notice if it had wings or a tail but because it was very similar in size to a 747 i assumed maybe it was just an optical illusion because of the angle i was viewing it at or whatnot.  i then noticed that it was going strangely slow for a plane though.  by this time i went behind some trees and i assumed it would be gone by the time i came to the clearing near the trafic light at ann arbor trail and hines drive but to my surprise it was still in the sky close to the same area i saw it in before my view was blocked by the trees.   i thought for a second that it might have been a blimp due its slow speed but  it seemed too thin to be a blimp.  i still couldn���t make out any wings or a tail at this point when i had an even better view of it.  when it speed up fairly rapidly and disappeared from view i knew it defintly wasn't a blimp however.

when i made it home i told my mom about this and to my surprise she said she just heard someone on the radio mention a cigar shaped craft.  i still didn���t make a report at this point because it was only one other person who said they had seen something and i thought maybe i was just being fooled by a strange optical trick or angle of flight and maybe it was a plane.  it was definitely out of the ordinary enough to make the hairs stand up on my arm and i really wanted to pull over to get a better look but with the traffic and everything i didn���t do it.   later however there was a whole rash of sightings of cigar shaped aircraft here in michigan in the past few weeks so it made me think i should make a report.

on a detroit tv news channel (forgot which channel) a few days ago (two  i believe) i head them speaking about  sightings of a cigar shaped craft at night that had red and orange lights and moved in a puzzling manner.  it was viewed by a large number of people and the police were called to the scene. according to news the police stated that there were no helicopters in the area ( i guess because of it's movement some people thought it could be helicopter).  the day after that i was listening to the drew and mike program and they had people calling in discussing the ufo sightings and one person  stated that he and all the people at a local children���s baseball game also noticed a cigar shaped craft with red and orange lights at an earlier date as well.  none of these sightings were in livonia or westland though but they were close by.

i will take some pictures of the area i witnessed the (whatever it was i saw) at.  maybe someone else has seen this as well?
content.summary: Metalic cigar shapped object

content.detailedDescription: I was chatting with a friend who was driving the opposite direction of me in our parking lot at the apartments.  stopped for a few minutes to talk thru our respective drivers' windows.  bright flash appeared in the sky above his car and in the distance by about a mile or so.  lasted only for a brief instant.  seemed like a trail of fire that was a perfectly straight streak in the sky... too fast to make out a shape of the vehicle, but definitely did not appear to be a shooting star.  seemed as though the flash of fire boosted the speed of the craft.  since both of our car motors were running, no sound was heard, if there was one.
content.summary: Bright flash, acceleration of a vessel that was lit up by the flash, fire trail/streak

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from dinner on sunday i believe (there is chance it was saturday i can find out for sure if you think this report is really important)on ann arbor trail  in michigan on the stretch next to hines park near farmington road. i first noticed what i thought was a plane when i was  on ann arbor trail driving  towards farmington rd and i quickly noticed that i couldn't see any wings or a tail and it was close enough that if it was a plane i should have been able to see them.   i still thought it could have been a plane and it was just an optical illusion however because it was about the size of 747.  eventually however i noticed it was going really slow so i thought maybe it was a blimp or something.   i then drove behind some trees and i expected it to be gone by the time i got past them but it was going so slow it was still in sight when i arrived near the stop light of ann arbor trail and hines rd and past the trees.  i got a better look at it then and still didn't notice any wings or a tail just a long cigar shaped vehicle and i was assuming it "must" be a blimp but then it speed up much to fast to be a blimp and fairly quickly went out of sight.  it was odd enough to be extreamly interesting and i was seriously considering pulling to the side of road and looking at it but with the traffic i decided against it.  

i then went home and told my mother about it and she said she just heard someone on the radio talking about a ufo sighting the day before in the general area so it peaked my interest.  now i notice however that there have been a large rash of cigar shaped ufo sighting here in michigan about a week after this. it was big enough news to talk about it on the local news channels and the detroit radio program drew and mike.  i'm sure your probably already aware of this however.

apparently the other sightings had been at night when it was dark however.  they said it was a cigar shaped craft with orange and red lights.  when i heard about all these people having sightings of a similar shaped craft and the police being called out to investigate and such i thought i should make a report.

if you want more info just ask but i have to get back to work i'm on lunch break now!  sorry if this is sloppy and hard to read i'm in hurry.
content.summary: Cigar shaped "metalic" object.

content.detailedDescription: Pude observar esta luz cerca de las monta���as direccion norte , aparecio la luz sobre las 11:10 horas , aparece tan solo durante el corto periodo de 30 segundos , cuando aparece comienza a realizar una especie de movimientos pulsantes (agrandandose y encogiendose ) ,despues de estar en el corto tiempo de los 30 segundos desaparece totalmente.
content.summary: Bola de luz con efecto pulsante

content.detailedDescription:
En la madrugada del martes 22 de julio se vio un extra���o objeto brillante, de tama���o grande, que volaba en direcci���n al oriente del ���rea metropolitana de monterrey, con rumbo al cerro de la silla. se perdi��� en el horizonte. 
in the early hours of tuesday, 22 july, saw a large strange shining object flying toward the east of the metropolitan area of monterrey, due to cerro de la silla. it was lost on the horizon.
content.summary: Objeto brillante sobre san nicolás.
content.locationName: San Nicolás de los Garza, Nuevo Leon

content.detailedDescription: Im sorry my english is very poor,i speak spanish.Me llamo jose.Trabajo en una fabrica metalurgica y a veces trabajo de noche.Hacia calor mi compa���������ero me dijo que salia a fumar,le mire y sali.Me sente afuera enfrente de el.Yo miraba el suelo,cuando fui a encender el cigarillo de golpe,encima de la fabrica estaba una luz amarilla que iba creciendo por momentos.Aquella luz parecia crecer sin cesar y cuando parecia tener toda su luminosidad fue disminuyendo de la misma manera que crecio.Se quedo en un punto peque���������o y una aura lo envolvia,a los pocos segundos aquello desaparecio sin dejar rastro alguno.Mi compa���������ero que jamas habia visto cosa alguna,se puso nervioso y empezo a saltar con las manos en la boca,estaba muy nervioso.A mi casi me da un patatus(un ataque de nervios).Pda(en esta zona del pirineo se ven muchas luces.)gracias por atenderme.Yo tambien busco la verdad,joseanufo.
content.summary: Light

content.detailedDescription:
I wasn't present at the beginning of this, but soon my friend came over at around 01:00 telling me to get outside, where i witnessed a strange light. it would start at one end just under the square of the big dipper, blinking white. then it would begin moving in a straight line towards the constellation draco while maintaining a red appearance. it would then start blinking white again before moving back the other way, still in a straight line, while having a blue-green appearance. the light continued this pattern (pause, blink, move) for around 45 minuets before taking off towards the city of killeen, simply vanishing at one point before reappearing to blink while seeming to hover before disappearing all together. 

there was another star like light, hovering over the housing area that seemed to strobe through a series of color while not moving. this light stayed like this for the duration of the event, before traveling away from post to simply disappear from sight. it moved in a straight line, contrary to the movement of the night sky, and even the airplane that passed directly over it at one point. 

there were a quite a few other lights exhibiting the same behaviors as the ones listed above (primarily the star like one), and it was rather overwhelming. my friend told me she'd been sitting out there since around 23:30 watching this display before coming and getting me. we were fortunate to get a few video clips of the phenomena, unfortunately we've not had a chance to get them off our cameras as of yet. 

living where we do, we've all gotten pretty well acquainted with the aircraft that frequents the area (some via personal experience due to occupation), and we agree that none of them move like what we saw tonight. rotor and fixed wing craft alike. 

we called it a night when the brightest star like 'blip' disappeared from view at around 02:00-02:30.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blinking strange colors and moving oddly, strange lights moved across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girfriend and best friend were camping it was about 2 oclock in the morining i took a walk away from the fire when i looked to the ske by a lake we have and saw a round object flashing multiple colors i called the people with me to look at it after this we stayed watching it it was so amazing to see how it moved it was moving in circle type of way but it was ammitting differnt light beams from it it almost looked as if it was scanning the surface of the woods i got an idea to shine the light at it and when i did it reacted to it i would shine it to differnt points in the air and it would fallow the light i was shining almost in the exact time i would change direction this is when it seemed to get closer and make even crazier manuvers in the sky when it started getting closer another one apeared behind it a little ways but this one seemed smaller then the first they were keeping a good distance away from each other and i decided to shine the flash light directly up from were we were and keep it pointed there once i positiond the flash light the first one looked like it was drawing closer then the unbelievable happend a really bright one came from the right of were we could see the sky and was moving real quik it passed by the first one we saw and jus kept goin to the trees to the left were we could not see it anymore this is when we counted about 5 more little ones coming in our direction not fast but steady this is when i felt real uncomfterable the were still reacting to the flash light but it got to scary so we went back to the fire i noticed the first 2 we saw stayed in the same location we left them at but i could see alot more in the skyes right above us but a good distance away then the scariest moment in my life happend i felt as if we were bieng watched i could see light in the trees in the distance and it looked like there were 3 differnt lights at differnt spots and the looked like the were scanning like the others but this time they were on the ground i got reaally nervos and then i heard the strangest sound ever it may sound weird but it sounded like the bugle from the things that were on war of the worlds no joke at this time it would have been around 3 thirty am and we tried to take our minds off it and jus sat around the camp fire the lights were still there but were not moving closer finnally around 5:30 am and it was getting light out we could still see some of the ufos still out but they made it look like they were jus fading out into space but the ship we saw on the ground with the strange light was still landed and still emmiting beams we could see it in the trees but it was hard cus there were so many to look through we decided to walk up to it and get a better look it had about four lights accross in a horizantle line and the ship its self look invisable exept for the loghts around it we tried to get closer and when we did it looked like it was moving towards us it shot a neon blue light right above our heads and we took off back to the camp sight it made a strang winding sound like a turbine or somthing but i know for a fact this was not of this world when it started to get more light we lost track of it in the distance of the trees but this was not the first time i have seen these around here i would spot them when i would be in town but when i would show people they would just say they were satalites and i knew they were not they didnt move as much as when we saw them in the woods but you would look at them one time and the next the would be in a differnt spot in the sky and would glow with some type of eternal lights there is alot of military up here and i dont know why they have alot of choppers and it makes me wonder why but after the night we saw them and were almost like communicating with them i can see them every night now just not as close this was real and i really do think people should have the right to know what is really going on

content.detailedDescription:
as i sat on my deck of my apartment building, talking to my sister on the phone,i saw a large cigar shaped craft with points on front and back,with no wings, no tail speeding across the sky heading s.E.


 it had a blue light on the front and a white light on the back and the body seemed to be whitish or silver. it made a funny motor like noise.
  i am certain it was not a helicopter, it was easy to see and it definetly looked like a cigar with points. and flying way faster than a helicopter. i live in a vally almost at sea level and the cloud cover is always very high up the object was below the clouds and would mesure an inch or inch and one half in the sky so it must have been very large, possibly 50 to 100 ft. long. this is somthing like i've never seen.

  i told my sister about it as i was seeing it. it totally stopped our conversation as i described what was happening. the object flew off out of my eye sight within 5 or 6 seconds, then she told me that she could report it for me on her computer. i was on the phone telling her this report as she typed it into your web sight.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft with blue light in front and white light in back, traveling below cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: While filling water jugs at a spring across the road (sw) from my house, i looked up to pass the time wathing the sky. frequent f-16 activity has kept me interested in sky-watching, as well as unexplainable satellite-like lights which move contrary to common satelites. looking to the northern skyline, i immediately saw a light which was partially obscured by a low cieling which was developed at around 2.5-3 thousand feet. the light source proved to be 4 white lights in a tight group appearing in an elongated diamond formation which i estimate to have been .5 to .75 miles distant. i estimate the object to have been between 50 and 75 feet from the front light to the rear light. viewed from directly below, i postulate that the light pattern might have appeared square. i am of the opinion that the lights were connected to one object, although i could not discern an object- only the lights and their direction, speed and relative configuration. the lights moved slowly (under 50mph) covering only a few degrees of sky before dissapearing in the low cieling. only five minutes later, as i finished filling the last of three 6-gallon water jugs, the sky cleared from the east (the lights' direction of travel) and nothing was to be seen. however, note that at their low altitude and my angle of view, they would have travelled beyond my sight by this time. again, the night was silent. there were not yet even leaves to rustle in the trees, and the light breeze did not produce a whisper in the needles of the red pines above my head; wind speed at ground level was ~5mph and aloft appeared ~20-25mph. the object, while i observed it, appeared to maintain a constant, straight and level trajectory against the wind. although the lights performed no extreme or even conventional maneuvers, it clearly was not a conventional aircraft and was clearly beyond the capabilities of any aircraft of which i am familiar. i felt no fear nor did i feel as if the object or its occupants were aware of me. i do feel as if it were definitly not natural phenomena and, further, that it was a powered craft under intelligent guidance. i am a former enlisted (e-4 sergeant) usaf security policeman (1983-1989) and have seen every type of aircraft in day, night and all-weather operations and have never observed an object before which so obviously defied all conventional. did any other observers report anything similar in my area during this time? i am curious to know if anything more could be added. (shape, color, size, sound of object; clues as to its origin, powerplant, etc.) respectfully submitted, mike o'c
content.summary: 4 wht lts slnt mvng agnst wnd wst 2 est 3kft

content.detailedDescription: the night of july 22nd at 9:50pm my son and i were getting out of our vehicle and on our way to do some flounder "gigging". out over the gulf of mexico a storm was releasing a display of lightning, and that is what initally caught my attention. not giving it much thought i proceeded to take our lantern and gig from the vehicle. walking tward the water we set off and as we looked forward another light in the sky caught our attention. my six year old automatically recognized what we were looking at as not being something "normal" and said "daddy, is that a ufo!?"                                                                                 for about 15 or 20 seconds we watched what looked to me like 5 glowing red balls of light trailing each other in a close formation traveling in a northward direction which was in the direction we were in as we were facing to the south walking to the water from the beach. then as quick as they appeared, they vanished.  to my suprise, neither one of us were scared. felt sort of an "enlightning" feeling.
content.summary: Looking into the night sky, i saw a series of lights that appeared to be in a line,and in a close formation

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the moon with my brother and looked close to the moon saw 2 cigar chaped obgect makeing fast menovers with out slowing to turn and seemed to be fallowing one another like cat and mouse lasted about a hour at that time we went in to our house to find a vedio recorder when we returnd thay had vanashed got 2 good pics of the 2 obgects
content.summary: Saw ufo while stargazing in my feild

content.detailedDescription:
I have never in all these years, reported this.  a friend and i were sleeping on lawn chairs in her backyard, in a subdivision.  it was a thing we did in this small indian town.  we were "camping out."  i was 14 or 15. (1968.  we were tired and 'called it a night."  

i said, "good night" to my friend.  as i rolled to one side to get ready for sleep, i could see the street light over the street.  i saw something i couldn't comprehend then, nor can i now.  there was a huge circular "ship" over the street  hovering.  i couldn't speak, yet i found myself saying aloud "oh. god"!  it hovered there.  i don't know how long.  it was as large as a house, maybe larger.  it was circular and had rectangular windows, where i felt that someone was watching me.  i swear to god, i saw "them".  i don't know how long it was there, but the next thing i heard my friend say was, "it's alright, they're gone."  i have never ever reported this.  i don't want anyone to think i'm "nuts."  i don't want to embarrass my family, and i am an educator, so i must be careful to not say anything that would damage my reputation.  i have a letter to  mr. budd hopkins, in the event of my death, however i don't really know how to reach him.

at this time, i was a naive child, and had never thought of ufos, nor would i have believed in such a thing.  i had necer been exposed to any infor

when i went home, down the street to my house. after the sun came up, i told my mom kinda' what had hapened, and she said,  "i believe you."  "i was listening to the radio, and ufos were reported over muncie, indiana last night, she said.  

why did this happen to me?  it changed me.  i no longer see this life as it was.  i have had many dreams realting to this event.  i don't know what to do.  i thought about seeking a hynotherapist, yet when this subject came up, i was too scared to "go there." 

it has taken me all these years to "voice" this.  i guess it's time.

sincerely,
t. brewer
content.summary: Large domed circular windowed object

content.detailedDescription: Sunday morning in pittsfield maine july 20, 2008 there was a full moon and the sky was clear. me and my 2 daughters were sitting outside at 1:16am talking and we looked up at the moon and we saw a very bright light that was moving very fast and then just disappeared (this was not a shooting star). as we continued to look up at the sky we saw more unexplainable bright lights one after another they happened within 10-15 minutes of each other. the bight lights would just appear for about 5 seconds then split in half then disappear there was no reasonable explanation for what had happened we had never seen anything like it before. the last one that me and my 2 daughters saw was around 3am and it flew right over us from north west to south east over the house and past the trees then we could not see it anymore. this time the light didn't disappear after 5 seconds it just continued to fly across the sky very fast. my daughter noticed that the object had 3 points that lit up like a triangle. you could not hear a sound/noise coming from the object it was very quiet. over the 2 hour span of time we saw about 7-8 bright bright lights that would appear out of no where flying very fast in the sky then split in half after 5 seconds then disappear. both my daughters went back inside to go to bed and i was out side drinking a coffee and smoking a cigarette and around 4am it was starting to get light out there was no stars in the sky and i was outside alone loading my boat on to my truck to go fishing with my son and i saw another bright light in the sky then it split in half then disappeared.
content.summary: Many strange flying bright lights that would apear in the sky; split in 2 then disappear

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Length 40 t0 60 ft around with yellow ,orange,white lights flashing around the ship!!!!! well since april 15 and now !We have seen35 light ships and 2 close range hovering disc's right near our house and im trying to get pic's now!! possable abduction!! over the last three years !! cronic pain in ears docter doesnt know some recalection of  and now im seeing crafts! my 8 yr old son has witnessed a fly bye!!!! with me on our porch!! for real please send someone this is real and were gonna prove it wow ya got this see for your self i guarantee you will see light ships!!!!! on july 14 at 3:30 am i wake up cause i got to go pee and it's summer my bedroom window is open with my fan going!! and im drawn to look out!! when i do above the trees in my yard about 1 or 2 blocks over and it had to be at least!130 feet of the ground just hovering!! with yellow ,orange,white lights that appeard to be going around the out side of this craft that is !! im guessing!! 40 to 60 ft around! so i rubb my eyes to make sure it's there and it is !1 si i look for about 2 mins and then i pee!! when i come back and look it's still!There so my digi cam needed batteries so i couldnt take a pic so i watched for about5 more mins!! and it never moved... please contact me this is real were normal people and i can guarantee you will leave alamosa colorado with video of light ship's we see em' every night and you will too this is not a hoax.
